titleStmt.title: An antidote against lust: or, A discourse of uncleanness, shewing its various kinds, great evil, the temptations to it, and most effectual cure. By Robert Carr, minister of the Church of England
titleStmt.author: Carr, Robert, fl. 1686-1696.

titleStmt.title: An antidote against lust: or, A discourse of uncleanness, shewing its various kinds, great evil, the temptations to it, and most effectual cure. By Robert Carr, minister of the Church of England
titleStmt.author: Carr, Robert, fl. 1686-1696.

notesStmt.note: The words 'its various kinds,... most effectual cure.' on title page, are gathered by a left brace.
